iteration2

Interface CardManager

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.vendingmachinesareus.AbstractHardwareListener, com.vendingmachinesareus.CardSlotListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Iteration2CardManager

    public interface CardManager
extends com.vendingmachinesareus.CardSlotListener
    The Interface CardManager. Classes which implement Card Manager will have the ability to tell the current state of the card slot as well as to verify correct Pin numbers and charge the card
